instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Store app . Browse or search for the app you want to review. Find and select the app to open the detail page. Scroll until you get to the reviews section. Select the number of stars. You can also tap Write a Review . Follow the onscreen instructions to write a review and add details. Tap Post .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Play Store app . Go to the detail page of the item you reviewed. Scroll to the reviews section. To edit: Tap Edit your review . Make the changes then tap Post . To delete: Tap More and then Delete .

Image titled Bring a Pet on a Lyft Ride Step 1 1 Open the Lyft app on your phone. Tap the app s icon from your phone s home screen to open it. Image titled Bring a Pet on a Lyft Ride Step 2 2 Request a ride. Tap the Request a Lyft button from the app s screen, and the nearest driver will arrive to pick you up. You ll also receive some basic information about the driver, including his or her name, the car they re driving, and their contact number Advertisement
